• Mobile-optimized controls with D-Pad and action buttons for touch devices
  • Real-time multiplayer using MQTT for seamless online mining with friends
  • Dynamic world generation with procedural terrain and resource distribution
  • Upgrade system for drills, hull, fuel capacity, cargo space, and special abilities
  • Shop system for buying/selling ores, purchasing upgrades, and consumables
  • Teleporter network for fast travel between discovered locations
  • Admin controls for server management including player kicking and promotion
  • IndexedDB save system with autosave and import/export functionality
  • Day/night cycle with dynamic lighting and weather effects
  • Minimap showing discovered areas and player positions

This browser-based mining game features real-time multiplayer gameplay with mobile controls, dynamic world generation, and extensive upgrade systems. Players can mine resources, trade with friends, and explore procedurally generated underground environments while managing fuel, hull integrity, and cargo capacity. The game includes admin controls, save systems, and a shop for purchasing upgrades and consumables.
